modules.description: This module parses and validates LEDES98BI-formatted input lines, offering two validation strategies: one that collects all errors and another that stops at the first error. It operates on lists of strings representing file lines and returns either a list of error messages or terminates early on failure. It is used for validating invoice data exchanged between law firms and clients.

Parses and validates LEDES1998B formatted invoice data line by line. It processes string lists representing invoice lines and reports errors either by collecting all issues or failing on the first one. Use `parse_and_validate_greedy` to gather all errors in a list or `parse_and_validate_eager` to stop at the first validation failure.

This module handles parsing and validation of LEDES invoice formats, specifically LEDES98BI and LEDES1998B. It processes lists of strings representing invoice lines and provides two validation modes: one that collects all errors and one that stops at the first error. It is used to validate structured invoice data exchanged between law firms and clients.
